main event: An unidentified object was observed in Broomall, Pennsylvania, on August 4, 1966, for a duration of 3 to 5 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared to have 3 windows,The observer noted that the light from the object was brighter than usual and seemed strange,The object moved southward, gained altitude, then turned northward and disappeared,Two red lights were also observed accompanying the object,The conclusion was that the object could NOT have been an aircraft.
sighted object: unidentified object with lights and three windows
witness description: The observer saw a strange bright light in the sky at night.
